headline.main: Riot police attempt to defuse clashes in Bahrain
headline.sub: Riot police attempt to defuse clashes in Bahrain

docs.snippet: Anti-government protesters and supporters of detained opposition leader Sheikh Ali Salman clash with riot police in a suburb of the Bahraini capital. Rough Cut (no reporter narration)....
docs.lead_paragraph: Anti-government protesters and supporters of detained opposition leader Sheikh Ali Salman clash with riot police in a suburb of the Bahraini capital. Rough Cut (no reporter narration).

headline.main: Jennings Leads Pistons to 114-95 Win Over Kings
headline.print_headline: Jennings Leads Pistons to 114-95 Win Over Kings

docs.snippet: Brandon Jennings scored 35 points as the Detroit Pistons beat the Sacramento Kings 114-95 Sunday for their fifth straight win....
docs.lead_paragraph: Brandon Jennings scored 35 points as the Detroit Pistons beat the Sacramento Kings 114-95 Sunday for their fifth straight win.

headline.main: Japan December Final Manufacturing PMI Shows Sustained Growth
headline.print_headline: Japan December Final Manufacturing PMI Shows Sustained Growth

docs.snippet: Japanese manufacturing activity showed sustained growth in December, a survey showed on Monday, suggesting domestic demand continues to recover after the economy fell into a surprise recession last year....
docs.lead_paragraph: Japanese manufacturing activity showed sustained growth in December, a survey showed on Monday, suggesting domestic demand continues to recover after the economy fell into a surprise recession last year.

headline.main: Glencore Says Restarting Australia Coal Mines Shut to Fight Glut
headline.print_headline: Glencore Says Restarting Australia Coal Mines Shut to Fight Glut

docs.snippet: Glencore Plc on Monday said it was restarting coal mining operations in Australia, following a three-week suspension aimed at combating a global supply glut made worse by protectionist trade measures introduced in China....
docs.lead_paragraph: Glencore Plc on Monday said it was restarting coal mining operations in Australia, following a three-week suspension aimed at combating a global supply glut made worse by protectionist trade measures introduced in China.

headline.main: Wisconsin Police Find Wedding Ring on Their Christmas Tree
headline.print_headline: Wisconsin Police Find Wedding Ring on Their Christmas Tree

docs.snippet: Police in a town near Milwaukee got a surprise when they took down the department's Christmas tree and found a diamond wedding ring placed on a branch as an ornament...
docs.lead_paragraph: Police in a town near Milwaukee got a surprise when they took down the department's Christmas tree and found a diamond wedding ring placed on a branch as an ornament

headline.main: Cowboys Rally Behind Romo to Eliminate Lions
headline.print_headline: Cowboys Rally Behind Romo to Eliminate Lions

docs.snippet: Tony Romo engineered a stirring second-half comeback to lead the Dallas Cowboys to a nail-biting 24-20 NFC wildcard win over the Detroit Lions on Sunday and a trip back to the divisional round to meet the Green Bay Packers....
docs.lead_paragraph: Tony Romo engineered a stirring second-half comeback to lead the Dallas Cowboys to a nail-biting 24-20 NFC wildcard win over the Detroit Lions on Sunday and a trip back to the divisional round to meet the Green Bay Packers.

headline.main: Police: Naked Man Broke Into Homes, Used Hot Tub
headline.print_headline: Police: Naked Man Broke Into Homes, Used Hot Tub

docs.snippet: Police near Salem, Oregon, say they arrested a naked man after he broke into two homes, drank booze and used a hot tub at one of them....
docs.lead_paragraph: Police near Salem, Oregon, say they arrested a naked man after he broke into two homes, drank booze and used a hot tub at one of them.

headline.main: China Frees Prices of Commodities, Services in Fresh Reforms
headline.print_headline: China Frees Prices of Commodities, Services in Fresh Reforms

docs.snippet: China has freed prices of 24 commodities and services, removing all price controls on agricultural products, among other reforms, its top economic planning agency said....
docs.lead_paragraph: China has freed prices of 24 commodities and services, removing all price controls on agricultural products, among other reforms, its top economic planning agency said.
